General.Name: Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret AS
General.Description: Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret Anonim Sriketi distributes information technology products in Turkey. It offers smart phones, tablets, modems, notebooks, and smart phone accessories, as well as security, wearable technology, smart living, artificial technologies, and virtual reality products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret Anonim Sriketi operates as a subsidiary of Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri Mühendislik Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
General.Address: Ayazaga Mah. Mimar Sinan Sok. No: 21, Istanbul, Turkey, 34485
